jobDescription: This internship role is to work on developing backend infrastructure to store existing data into a graph database. You will work closely with experienced software engineers on technical projects that directly impact the shipping product.  In this position you will work on the core C++ Simulink engine code base. You will use multi-threading to develop infrastructure for users to write their own algorithms to analyze their models. This developer will have a significant role from defining requirements through development and testing. There will be ample opportunity for mentorship from senior developers but the intern will have considerable autonomy as well. Programming experience in C++Candidates must be pursuing a master's level or a PhD level degree in a technical discipline.
